verses.verse: וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> came כְּכַלֹּתוֹ֙ <S%H3615><s%> And it came to pass when he had made an end לְדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> of speaking אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to שָׁא֔וּל <S%H7586><s%> unto Saul וְנֶ֙פֶשׁ֙ <S%H5315><s%> that the soul יְה֣וֹנָתָ֔ן <S%H3083><s%> of Jonathan נִקְשְׁרָ֖ה <S%H7194><s%> was knit בְּנֶ֣פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> with the soul דָּוִ֑ד <S%H1732><s%> of David [וַיֶּאֱהָבֹו כ] (וַיֶּאֱהָבֵ֥הוּ <S%H157><s%> loved ק) יְהוֹנָתָ֖ן <S%H3083><s%> and Jonathan כְּנַפְשֽׁוֹ׃ <S%H5315><s%> him as his own soul

וַיִּקָּחֵ֥הוּ <S%H3947><s%> took שָׁא֖וּל <S%H7586><s%> And Saul בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> him that day הַה֑וּא <S%H1931><s%> he וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> and did not נְתָנ֔וֹ <S%H5414><s%> and would let לָשׁ֖וּב <S%H7725><s%> him go no more home בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> house אָבִֽיו׃ <S%H1><s%> to his father's

וַיִּכְרֹ֧ת <S%H3772><s%> made יְהוֹנָתָ֛ן <S%H3083><s%> Then Jonathan וְדָוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> and David בְּרִ֑ית <S%H1285><s%> a covenant בְּאַהֲבָת֥וֹ <S%H160><s%> because he loved אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> כְּנַפְשֽׁוֹ׃ <S%H5315><s%> him as his own soul

וַיִּתְפַּשֵּׁ֣ט <S%H6584><s%> stripped יְהוֹנָתָ֗ן <S%H3083><s%> And Jonathan אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמְּעִיל֙ <S%H4598><s%> himself of the robe אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> after עָלָ֔יו <S%H5921><s%> and וַֽיִּתְּנֵ֖הוּ <S%H5414><s%> that [was] upon him and gave לְדָוִ֑ד <S%H1732><s%> it to David וּמַדָּ֕יו <S%H4055><s%> and his garments וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> including חַרְבּ֥וֹ <S%H2719><s%> even to his sword וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> including קַשְׁתּ֖וֹ <S%H7198><s%> and to his bow וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> including חֲגֹרֽוֹ׃ <S%H2290><s%> and his belt

וַיֵּצֵ֨א <S%H3318><s%> went out דָוִ֜ד <S%H1732><s%> And David בְּכֹל֩ <S%H3605><s%> of all אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> after יִשְׁלָחֶ֤נּוּ <S%H7971><s%> sent שָׁאוּל֙ <S%H7586><s%> whithersoever Saul יַשְׂכִּ֔יל <S%H7919><s%> him [and] behaved himself wisely וַיְשִׂמֵ֣הוּ <S%H7760><s%> set שָׁא֔וּל <S%H7586><s%> and Saul עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> over אַנְשֵׁ֣י <S%H582><s%> him over the men הַמִּלְחָמָ֑ה <S%H4421><s%> of war וַיִּיטַב֙ <S%H3190><s%> and he was accepted בְּעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> in the sight כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> of all the people וְגַ֕ם <S%H1571><s%> and also בְּעֵינֵ֖י <S%H5869><s%> and also in the sight עַבְדֵ֥י <S%H5650><s%> servants שָׁאֽוּל׃ <S%H7586><s%> of Saul's פ

וַיְהִ֣י <S%H1961><s%> happened בְּבוֹאָ֗ם <S%H935><s%> And it came to pass as they came בְּשׁ֤וּב <S%H7725><s%> was returned דָּוִד֙ <S%H1732><s%> when David מֵהַכּ֣וֹת <S%H5221><s%> from the slaughter אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַפְּלִשְׁתִּ֔י <S%H6430><s%> of the Philistine וַתֵּצֶ֨אנָה <S%H3318><s%> came out הַנָּשִׁ֜ים <S%H802><s%> that the women מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all עָרֵ֤י <S%H5892><s%> of all cities יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel [לָשֹׁור כ] (לָשִׁ֣יר <S%H7891><s%> sing ק) וְהַמְּחֹל֔וֹת <S%H4246><s%> and dancing לִקְרַ֖את <S%H7122><s%> to meet שָׁא֣וּל <S%H7586><s%> Saul הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king בְּתֻפִּ֥ים <S%H8596><s%> with tabrets בְּשִׂמְחָ֖ה <S%H8057><s%> with joy וּבְשָׁלִשִֽׁים׃ <S%H7991><s%> and with instruments

וַֽתַּעֲנֶ֛ינָה <S%H6030><s%> answered הַנָּשִׁ֥ים <S%H802><s%> And the women הַֽמְשַׂחֲק֖וֹת <S%H7832><s%> [one another] as they played וַתֹּאמַ֑רְןָ <S%H559><s%> and said הִכָּ֤ה <S%H5221><s%> hath slain שָׁאוּל֙ <S%H7586><s%> Saul [בַּאֱלְפֹו כ] (בַּאֲלָפָ֔יו <S%H505><s%> thousand ק) וְדָוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> and David בְּרִבְבֹתָֽיו׃ <S%H7233><s%> his ten thousands

וַיִּ֨חַר <S%H2734><s%> wroth לְשָׁא֜וּל <S%H7586><s%> And Saul מְאֹ֗ד <S%H3966><s%> was very וַיֵּ֤רַע <S%H7489><s%> afflict בְּעֵינָיו֙ <S%H5869><s%> affliction הַדָּבָ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> and the saying הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> this וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> him and he said נָתְנ֤וּ <S%H5414><s%> They have ascribed לְדָוִד֙ <S%H1732><s%> unto David רְבָב֔וֹת <S%H7233><s%> ten thousands וְלִ֥י נָתְנ֖וּ <S%H5414><s%> and to me they have ascribed הָאֲלָפִ֑ים <S%H505><s%> [but] thousands וְע֥וֹד <S%H5750><s%> more ל֖וֹ אַ֥ךְ <S%H389><s%> also הַמְּלוּכָֽה׃ <S%H4410><s%> kingsom

וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> become שָׁא֖וּל <S%H7586><s%> And Saul [עָוֹן כ] (עֹויֵ֣ן <S%H5771><s%> fault ק) אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דָּוִ֑ד <S%H1732><s%> David מֵהַיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> from that day הַה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he וָהָֽלְאָה׃ <S%H1973><s%> and forward ס

וַיְהִ֣י <S%H1961><s%> came מִֽמָּחֳרָ֗ת <S%H4283><s%> And it came to pass on the morrow וַתִּצְלַ֣ח <S%H6743><s%> came רוּחַ֩ <S%H7307><s%> spirit אֱלֹהִ֨ים ׀ <S%H430><s%> from God רָעָ֤ה ׀ <S%H7451><s%> that the evil אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> upon שָׁאוּל֙ <S%H7586><s%> upon Saul וַיִּתְנַבֵּ֣א <S%H5012><s%> and he prophesied בְתוֹךְ־ <S%H8432><s%> in the midst הַבַּ֔יִת <S%H1004><s%> of the house וְדָוִ֛ד <S%H1732><s%> and David מְנַגֵּ֥ן <S%H5059><s%> played בְּיָד֖וֹ <S%H3027><s%> with his hand כְּי֣וֹם ׀ <S%H3117><s%> as at other times בְּי֑וֹם <S%H3117><s%> usual וְהַחֲנִ֖ית <S%H2595><s%> and [there was] a javelin בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> hand שָׁאֽוּל׃ <S%H7586><s%> in Saul's

וַיָּ֤טֶל <S%H2904><s%> cast שָׁאוּל֙ <S%H7586><s%> And Saul אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> הַחֲנִ֔ית <S%H2595><s%> the javelin וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> for he said אַכֶּ֥ה <S%H5221><s%> I will smite בְדָוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> David וּבַקִּ֑יר <S%H7023><s%> even to the wall וַיִּסֹּ֥ב <S%H5437><s%> avoided out דָּוִ֛ד <S%H1732><s%> [with it] And David מִפָּנָ֖יו <S%H6440><s%> of his presence פַּעֲמָֽיִם׃ <S%H6471><s%> twice

וַיִּרָ֥א <S%H3372><s%> was afraid שָׁא֖וּל <S%H7586><s%> And Saul מִלִּפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> of דָוִ֑ד <S%H1732><s%> David כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for הָיָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> become יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> because the LORD עִמּ֔וֹ <S%H5973><s%> with וּמֵעִ֥ם <S%H5973><s%> from שָׁא֖וּל <S%H7586><s%> from Saul סָֽר׃ <S%H5493><s%> was with him and was departed

וַיְסִרֵ֤הוּ <S%H5493><s%> removed שָׁאוּל֙ <S%H7586><s%> Therefore Saul מֵֽעִמּ֔וֹ <S%H5973><s%> his presence וַיְשִׂמֵ֥הוּ <S%H7760><s%> him from him and made ל֖וֹ שַׂר־ <S%H8269><s%> him his captain אָ֑לֶף <S%H505><s%> over a thousand וַיֵּצֵ֥א <S%H3318><s%> and he went out וַיָּבֹ֖א <S%H935><s%> and came in לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before הָעָֽם׃ <S%H5971><s%> the people פ

וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> become דָוִ֛ד <S%H1732><s%> And David לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all דָּרְכָ֖ו <S%H1870><s%> in all his ways מַשְׂכִּ֑יל <S%H7919><s%> behaved himself wisely וַֽיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD עִמּֽוֹ׃ <S%H5973><s%> with

וַיַּ֣רְא <S%H7200><s%> saw שָׁא֔וּל <S%H7586><s%> Wherefore when Saul אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he מַשְׂכִּ֣יל <S%H7919><s%> wisely מְאֹ֑ד <S%H3966><s%> himself very וַיָּ֖גָר <S%H1481><s%> he was afraid מִפָּנָֽיו׃ <S%H6440><s%> of

וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> But all Israel וִיהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> and Judah אֹהֵ֖ב <S%H157><s%> loved אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דָּוִ֑ד <S%H1732><s%> David כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for ה֛וּא <S%H1931><s%> and he יוֹצֵ֥א <S%H3318><s%> because he went out וָבָ֖א <S%H935><s%> and came in לִפְנֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H6440><s%> before פ

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said שָׁא֜וּל <S%H7586><s%> And Saul אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to דָּוִ֗ד <S%H1732><s%> to David הִנֵּה֩ <S%H2009><s%> Here בִתִּ֨י <S%H1323><s%> daughter הַגְּדוֹלָ֤ה <S%H1419><s%> Behold my elder מֵרַב֙ <S%H4764><s%> Merab אֹתָהּ֙ <S%H853><s%> אֶתֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> her will I give לְךָ֣ לְאִשָּׁ֔ה <S%H802><s%> thee to wife אַ֚ךְ <S%H389><s%> only הֱיֵה־ <S%H1961><s%> become לִּ֣י לְבֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> man חַ֔יִל <S%H2428><s%> valiant וְהִלָּחֵ֖ם <S%H3898><s%> for me and fight מִלְחֲמ֣וֹת <S%H4421><s%> battles יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD'S וְשָׁא֣וּל <S%H7586><s%> For Saul אָמַ֗ר <S%H559><s%> said אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay תְּהִ֤י <S%H1961><s%> become יָדִי֙ <S%H3027><s%> Let not mine hand בּ֔וֹ וּתְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> become ב֖וֹ יַד־ <S%H3027><s%> be upon him but let the hand פְּלִשְׁתִּֽים׃ <S%H6430><s%> of the Philistines ס

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said דָּוִ֜ד <S%H1732><s%> And David אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to שָׁא֗וּל <S%H7586><s%> unto Saul מִ֤י <S%H4310><s%> Who אָֽנֹכִי֙ <S%H595><s%> I וּמִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> and what חַיַּ֔י <S%H2416><s%> Who [am] I? and what [is] my life מִשְׁפַּ֥חַת <S%H4940><s%> family אָבִ֖י <S%H1><s%> [or] my father's בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> in Israel כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אֶהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become חָתָ֖ן <S%H2860><s%> that I should be son in law לַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> should be the king's

וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> came בְּעֵ֥ת <S%H6256><s%> But it came to pass at the time תֵּ֛ת <S%H5414><s%> should have been given אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מֵרַ֥ב <S%H4764><s%> when Merab בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> daughter שָׁא֖וּל <S%H7586><s%> Saul's לְדָוִ֑ד <S%H1732><s%> to David וְהִ֧יא <S%H1931><s%> she נִתְּנָ֛ה <S%H5414><s%> that she was given לְעַדְרִיאֵ֥ל <S%H5741><s%> unto Adriel הַמְּחֹלָתִ֖י <S%H4259><s%> the Meholathite לְאִשָּֽׁה׃ <S%H802><s%> to wife

וַתֶּאֱהַ֛ב <S%H157><s%> loved מִיכַ֥ל <S%H4324><s%> And Michal בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> daughter שָׁא֖וּל <S%H7586><s%> Saul's אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דָּוִ֑ד <S%H1732><s%> David וַיַּגִּ֣דוּ <S%H5046><s%> and they told לְשָׁא֔וּל <S%H7586><s%> Saul וַיִּשַׁ֥ר <S%H3474><s%> was agreeable הַדָּבָ֖ר <S%H1697><s%> and the thing בְּעֵינָֽיו׃ <S%H5869><s%> affliction

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said שָׁא֜וּל <S%H7586><s%> And Saul אֶתְּנֶ֤נָּה <S%H5414><s%> I will give לּוֹ֙ וּתְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> may become ל֣וֹ לְמוֹקֵ֔שׁ <S%H4170><s%> him her that she may be a snare וּתְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> may become ב֖וֹ יַד־ <S%H3027><s%> to him and that the hand פְּלִשְׁתִּ֑ים <S%H6430><s%> of the Philistines וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said שָׁאוּל֙ <S%H7586><s%> may be against him Wherefore Saul אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to דָּוִ֔ד <S%H1732><s%> to David בִּשְׁתַּ֛יִם <S%H8147><s%> in [the one of] the twain תִּתְחַתֵּ֥ן <S%H2859><s%> be my son in law בִּ֖י הַיּֽוֹם׃ <S%H3117><s%> Thou shalt this day

וַיְצַ֨ו <S%H6680><s%> commanded שָׁא֜וּל <S%H7586><s%> And Saul אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֲבָדָ֗ו <S%H5650><s%> his servants דַּבְּר֨וּ <S%H1696><s%> [saying] Commune אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to דָּוִ֤ד <S%H1732><s%> with David בַּלָּט֙ <S%H3909><s%> secretly לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> and say הִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold חָפֵ֤ץ <S%H2654><s%> hath delight בְּךָ֙ הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Behold the king וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all עֲבָדָ֖יו <S%H5650><s%> in thee and all his servants אֲהֵב֑וּךָ <S%H157><s%> love וְעַתָּ֖ה <S%H6258><s%> now הִתְחַתֵּ֥ן <S%H2859><s%> son in law בַּמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> thee now therefore be the king's
